### About Me

I am a recent graduate of the [Master of Environmental Data Science](https://bren.ucsb.edu/masters-programs/master-environmental-data-science) program at UCSB. My [capstone](https://alexclippinger.github.io/portfolio/2021-12-23-group-project/index.html)  research involved the use of decision-tree-based algorithms to explore variable importance from ecohydrologic model output.
